title: Topic 001 Question 041
body: You have a connected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You need to offer users the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) engine for production workloads.
Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Add an AKS base image to Azure Stack Hub Marketplace.
Add a Docker extension to Azure Stack Hub Marketplace.
From the Azure Active Directory admin center, create a service principal.
Add an Ubuntu Server image to Azure Stack Hub Marketplace.
Add a custom script extension to Azure Stack Hub Marketplace.
From the Azure Active Directory admin center, create a user-assigned managed identity.
